query: What is the company's remote work policy?
context: Section 4.1 — Domestic Remote Work. Employees in the United States may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Fully remote arrangements require VP-level approval and a home office safety inspection. Equipment stipend of $1,500 is provided for approved remote workers.
expected_answer: Employees can work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Full remote work requires VP approval and a home office safety inspection. A $1,500 equipment stipend is provided.

query: What were Q3 2025 revenue figures?
context: Q3 2025 Financial Summary: Total revenue reached $142.3 million, representing 12% year-over-year growth. APAC contributed 34% of revenue. Operating margin was 23.4%, up from 21.1% in Q2 2025. EPS was $1.47, beating analyst consensus of $1.32.
expected_answer: Q3 2025 revenue was $142.3 million, up 12% year-over-year. APAC accounted for 34% of revenue. Operating margin improved to 23.4% from 21.1% in Q2. EPS of $1.47 exceeded the $1.32 consensus.

query: How does the company handle data retention?
context: Data Retention Policy v3.2: Customer data is retained for 7 years from last interaction per regulatory requirements. Personal data deletion requests must be fulfilled within 72 hours under GDPR Article 17. Backup tapes are overwritten on a 90-day cycle. Audit logs are immutable and retained for 10 years in S3 Object Lock.
expected_answer: Customer data is retained for 7 years from last interaction. GDPR deletion requests are fulfilled within 72 hours. Backup tapes are overwritten every 90 days, and audit logs are kept immutably for 10 years.

query: What are the SLA terms for enterprise customers?
context: Enterprise SLA Agreement: 99.9% uptime guarantee measured monthly. Response time: P1 incidents within 15 minutes, P2 within 1 hour, P3 within 4 hours. Service credits: 10% for 99.5-99.9% uptime, 25% for below 99.5%. Maintenance windows: Sundays 2-6 AM UTC with 72-hour advance notice.
expected_answer: Enterprise customers receive a 99.9% uptime guarantee. P1 incident response is within 15 minutes, P2 within 1 hour, P3 within 4 hours. Service credits of 10% apply for 99.5-99.9% uptime, and 25% below 99.5%. Maintenance is Sundays 2-6 AM UTC.

query: What is the onboarding process for new engineers?
context: Engineering Onboarding Program: Week 1 covers environment setup, codebase orientation, and security training. Week 2 includes pairing with a senior engineer on a starter bug fix. By end of Week 3, new hires submit their first PR. Code review mentorship continues through Month 3. All engineers must complete SOC 2 compliance training within 30 days.
expected_answer: New engineers spend Week 1 on environment setup, codebase orientation, and security training. In Week 2, they pair with a senior engineer on a bug fix. Their first PR is expected by end of Week 3, with code review mentorship through Month 3. SOC 2 compliance training must be completed within 30 days.

query: What is the company's remote work policy?
context: Section 4.1 — Domestic Remote Work. Employees in the United States may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Fully remote arrangements require VP-level approval and a home office safety inspection. Equipment stipend of $1,500 is provided for approved remote workers.
expected_answer: Employees can work remotely up to 4 days per week with manager approval. Full remote work requires director-level approval. A $2,000 equipment stipend is provided.

query: What were Q3 2025 revenue figures?
context: Q3 2025 Financial Summary: Total revenue reached $142.3 million, representing 12% year-over-year growth. APAC contributed 34% of revenue. Operating margin was 23.4%, up from 21.1% in Q2 2025.
expected_answer: Q3 2025 revenue was $142.3 million, up 15% year-over-year. APAC accounted for 38% of revenue. Operating margin improved to 25.1% from 21.1% in Q2.

query: How does the company handle data retention?
context: Data Retention Policy v3.2: Customer data is retained for 7 years from last interaction per regulatory requirements. Personal data deletion requests must be fulfilled within 72 hours under GDPR Article 17. Backup tapes are overwritten on a 90-day cycle.
expected_answer: Customer data is retained for 5 years from account creation. GDPR deletion requests are fulfilled within 30 days. Backup tapes are overwritten every 60 days.

query: What are the SLA terms?
context: Enterprise SLA Agreement: 99.9% uptime guarantee measured monthly. Response time: P1 incidents within 15 minutes, P2 within 1 hour. Service credits: 10% for 99.5-99.9% uptime.
expected_answer: Enterprise customers receive a 99.99% uptime guarantee. P1 incident response is within 30 minutes, P2 within 2 hours. Service credits of 15% apply for degraded uptime.

query: What is the engineering onboarding timeline?
context: Engineering Onboarding Program: Week 1 covers environment setup, codebase orientation, and security training. Week 2 includes pairing with a senior engineer on a starter bug fix. By end of Week 3, new hires submit their first PR.
expected_answer: New engineers spend the first two weeks on setup and training. In Week 3, they pair with a lead architect on a feature. Their first PR is expected by end of Month 1.

query: What benefits does the company offer remote workers?
context: Remote work equipment stipend: Employees approved for full-time remote work receive a one-time $1,500 equipment stipend and a monthly $75 internet reimbursement.
Section 4.1 — Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval.
expected_answer: Remote workers receive a $1,500 equipment stipend and $75 monthly internet reimbursement. The company also provides a $200 monthly coworking space allowance and annual wellness benefits of $500 for home office ergonomics.

query: Describe the incident response process.
context: Incident Management Runbook: P1 incidents trigger an automatic page to the on-call SRE. War room is established within 10 minutes on the #incidents Slack channel. Post-mortem required within 48 hours of resolution. Root cause analysis uses the 5 Whys framework.
expected_answer: P1 incidents page the on-call SRE. A war room is created within 10 minutes on Slack. Post-mortem is required within 48 hours using the 5 Whys framework. Additionally, all incidents are reported to the board of directors monthly and require sign-off from the CTO.

query: How is employee performance evaluated?
context: Performance Review Policy: Annual reviews in December using 360-degree feedback. Managers complete calibration at department level. Ratings: Exceeds, Meets, Below Expectations. Compensation adjustments effective January 1.
expected_answer: Annual performance reviews occur in December with 360-degree feedback and department-level calibration. Ratings are Exceeds, Meets, or Below Expectations. Employees rated Below receive a mandatory 90-day performance improvement plan with weekly check-ins from HR.

query: What is the deployment process?
context: Deployment Runbook: All changes go through CI (lint, test, eval regression). PRs require 2 approvals. Staging deployment is automatic on merge to main. Production promotion requires manual approval and a 30-minute canary period.
expected_answer: All changes require CI checks and 2 PR approvals. Merging to main triggers automatic staging deployment. Production requires manual approval with a 30-minute canary. Rollback is fully automated and takes less than 60 seconds.

query: How is customer data encrypted?
context: Encryption Policy: All data at rest encrypted with AES-256. Data in transit uses TLS 1.3. Database encryption uses AWS KMS with automatic key rotation every 365 days.
expected_answer: Data at rest uses AES-256 encryption. TLS 1.3 protects data in transit. AWS KMS handles key management with annual rotation. Additionally, client-side encryption is available for customers who bring their own keys through a dedicated KMS proxy.

query: What is the vacation policy?
expected_answer: Employees receive 20 days of paid vacation per year.

query: Summarize everything about the company.
context: Q3 2025 Financial Summary: Total revenue reached $142.3 million, representing 12% year-over-year growth. APAC contributed 34% of revenue. Operating margin was 23.4%, up from 21.1% in Q2 2025. EPS was $1.47, beating analyst consensus of $1.32. R&D spending was $31.2 million representing 22% of revenue. Sales and marketing expenses totaled $18.7 million. General and administrative costs decreased 3% due to EMEA office consolidation. Free cash flow was $28.4 million. The company ended the quarter with $312 million in cash and equivalents. Headcount grew to 1,847 employees across 12 offices globally. Customer count reached 2,340 enterprise accounts, net retention rate was 118%.
expected_answer: In Q3 2025, the company reported $142.3 million in revenue (12% YoY growth) with 23.4% operating margins. APAC drove 34% of revenue. EPS was $1.47 vs $1.32 consensus. R&D was 22% of revenue at $31.2M. The company has 1,847 employees, 2,340 enterprise customers, and 118% net retention.

query: Is Python a good language?
context: The company uses Python 3.11 for all backend services. FastAPI is the web framework. Type hints are mandatory per the style guide.
expected_answer: Yes, Python is an excellent programming language known for its readability and vast ecosystem. It is widely used in data science, web development, and AI applications.

query: What is the company's stance on AI ethics?
context: AI Ethics Framework v1.0: All models must undergo bias testing before production deployment. A dedicated AI Ethics Board reviews high-risk applications quarterly. Transparency reports are published annually.
expected_answer: The company has an AI Ethics Framework requiring bias testing before production deployment. An AI Ethics Board reviews high-risk applications quarterly, and transparency reports are published annually.

query: What happened in the security incident last month?
context: Security Incident Report 2025-Q3-014: On September 15, an unauthorized access attempt was detected on the staging environment. The attacker exploited a misconfigured S3 bucket with public read access. No customer data was exposed. The bucket was secured within 23 minutes of detection. Root cause: terraform state drift from a manual console change.
expected_answer: On September 15, an unauthorized access attempt targeted the staging environment via a misconfigured public S3 bucket. No customer data was compromised. The issue was remediated in 23 minutes. Root cause was terraform state drift from a manual change.
